title: Leo Beuerman
brief_description: Documents the life of Leo Beuerman, an unusual man, physically handicapped since birth, describing his ability to overcome diversity and his philosophy of life. Tells how Leo was able to see a path through his handicap and arrive at a point where he is able to enjoy life. Background music sets a moody and relaxed feel to this unusual and interesting film. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
